name: Treemates
description:
After years of fairies stealing from you and your roommates, one mischievous fairy has cursed you to be helpful in the worst way possible! All the stolen items are returning, stuck to you, and you can give them back to everyone but only if you hurry!

NOTE: Ramps require "up" or "down"!

CONTROLS:

WS and DOWN/UP to enter ladders/doors/ramps
AD and LEFT/RIGHT to move
SPACE to give
(controller joystick and A button also works)
